protocol_name: Intracellular Staining With True-Phos™ Perm Buffer in Whole Blood
protocol_name_html: Intracellular Staining With True-Phos™ Perm Buffer in Whole Blood

components.data: Warm 1 X RBC Lysis/Fixation Solution (Cat# 422401, 10X solution). For each 0.1 mL of whole blood, aliquot 2 mL of 1 X RBC Lysis/Fixation Solution to a 50 mL conical tube and warm to 37°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Warm 1 X RBC Lysis/Fixation Solution (Cat# 422401, 10X solution). For each 0.1 mL of whole blood, aliquot 2 mL of 1 X RBC Lysis/Fixation Solution to a 50 mL conical tube and warm to 37°C.

components.data: Buffer Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Chill True-Phos™ Perm Buffer to -20°C. For each 0.1 mL of whole blood, aliquot 1.0 mL of True-Phos™ Perm Buffer and chill to -20°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Chill True-Phos™ Perm Buffer to -20°C. For each 0.1 mL of whole blood, aliquot 1.0 mL of True-Phos™ Perm Buffer and chill to -20°C.

components.data: Buffer Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data:
Aliquot 0.1 mL of whole blood (heparin) into a 50 mL conical tube for each test

 

Tips:

 

- 22 tests (or 2.2 mL of whole blood) are the maximum number of tests that can be processed in a 50 mL conical, due to volume constraints.

 

-Prepare two aliquots: Negative control: untreated, Positive control: treated with stimuli

 

-Incubate the cells with the appropriate stimuli, at the suitable temperature and time.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Aliquot 0.1 mL of whole blood (heparin) into a 50 mL conical tube for each test

 

Tips:

 

- 22 tests (or 2.2 mL of whole blood) are the maximum number of tests that can be processed in a 50 mL conical, due to volume constraints.

 

-Prepare two aliquots: Negative control: untreated, Positive control: treated with stimuli

 

-Incubate the cells with the appropriate stimuli, at the suitable temperature and time.

components.data: Sample Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Fix the cells immediately after treatment by pre-warmed 1 X RBC Lysis/Fixation Solution. Gently pipette to ensure thorough mixing
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Fix the cells immediately after treatment by pre-warmed 1 X RBC Lysis/Fixation Solution. Gently pipette to ensure thorough mixing

components.data: Sample Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Incubate at 37°C for 15 minutes to ensure cells are properly fixed
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 37°C for 15 minutes to ensure cells are properly fixed

components.data: Sample Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge cells at 350 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant, vortex to resuspend cell pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge cells at 350 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant, vortex to resuspend cell pellet

components.data: Sample Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Add sufficient Cell Staining Buffer to wash the cells (approximately 2 ml for each 1 x 106 cells, BioLegend Cell Staining Buffer recommended, Cat#420201), centrifuge at 350 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, and decant supernatant. Repeat, for a total of two washes
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add sufficient Cell Staining Buffer to wash the cells (approximately 2 ml for each 1 x 106 cells, BioLegend Cell Staining Buffer recommended, Cat#420201), centrifuge at 350 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, and decant supernatant. Repeat, for a total of two washes

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Gently pipette cells using residual volume to resuspend cell pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Gently pipette cells using residual volume to resuspend cell pellet

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of Intracellular Staining With True-Phos™ Perm Buffer in Whole Blood
source_data.protocol_name: Intracellular Staining With True-Phos™ Perm Buffer in Whole Blood
source_data.protocol_name_html: Intracellular Staining With True-Phos™ Perm Buffer in Whole Blood
source_data.annotation: Note: if cells are not fully resuspended, True-Phos™ Perm Buffer addition will cause significant cell loss
source_data.thread_text: Note: if cells are not fully resuspended, True-Phos™ Perm Buffer addition will cause significant cell loss
source_data.body: Note: if cells are not fully resuspended, True-Phos™ Perm Buffer addition will cause significant cell loss

components.data:
While vortexing, permeabilize cells by adding pre-chilled True-Phos™ Perm Buffer

 

Example: for 1 mL of whole blood, permeabilize with 10 mL of pre-chilled True-Phos™ Perm Buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
While vortexing, permeabilize cells by adding pre-chilled True-Phos™ Perm Buffer

 

Example: for 1 mL of whole blood, permeabilize with 10 mL of pre-chilled True-Phos™ Perm Buffer

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Incubate at -20°C for 60 minutes to ensure cells are properly permeabilized
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at -20°C for 60 minutes to ensure cells are properly permeabilized

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge cells at 1000 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant, vortex to resuspend cell pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge cells at 1000 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant, vortex to resuspend cell pellet

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Add sufficient Cell Staining Buffer to wash the cells, centrifuge cells at 1000 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant. Repeat, for a total of two washes
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add sufficient Cell Staining Buffer to wash the cells, centrifuge cells at 1000 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant. Repeat, for a total of two washes

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data:
Resuspend the cells in a volume of Cell Staining Buffer equivalent to the starting volume of blood

 

Example: if starting volume of whole blood was 1 mL, resuspend cell pellet in 1 mL of Cell Staining Buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Resuspend the cells in a volume of Cell Staining Buffer equivalent to the starting volume of blood

 

Example: if starting volume of whole blood was 1 mL, resuspend cell pellet in 1 mL of Cell Staining Buffer

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Transfer 100 ml to a 12 x 75 mm tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer 100 ml to a 12 x 75 mm tube

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Add antibody cocktail(s) to appropriate tubes, vortex to mix, and incubate for 30 minutes at room temperature in the dark
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add antibody cocktail(s) to appropriate tubes, vortex to mix, and incubate for 30 minutes at room temperature in the dark

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Add 2 mL of Cell Staining Buffer, centrifuge cells at 1000 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant. Repeat, for a total of two washes
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 2 mL of Cell Staining Buffer, centrifuge cells at 1000 x g at room temperature for 5 minutes, decant supernatant. Repeat, for a total of two washes

components.data: Staining with Specific Antibodies
components.name: Section

components.data: Resuspend cells in approximately 500 uL of Cell Staining Buffer and analyze with a flow cytometer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend cells in approximately 500 uL of Cell Staining Buffer and analyze with a flow cytometer

components.name: Section
